text: Hans Thomson (14 June 1888 - 23 May 1963) was a German fencer. He competed at the 1912 and 1928 Summer Olympics. He was the twin brother of Julius Thomson, who also competed for Germany at the Olympics in fencing. == References == Category:1888 births Category:1963 deaths Category:German male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Germany Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Twin people from Germany Category:People from Offenbach am Main Category:Twin sportspeople
title: Hans Thomson
